EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage App.Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: A Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join tomorrow's webinar A Comprehensive Spring Showcase: Personal Cloud Storage Application with Erdem Gunay. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, June 9, 2015 Europe: 3:00pm GMT Summer Time (London, GMT+01:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=efe49b68a236085035c2bb3de4747b4c2> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 750 810 Thank you,
